message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $14,000. I believe this product would be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This is a very fair price for a product of this quality.
